{{wikipedia|Shuixian Zunwang}}

===Etymology===
As a quintet, thought to derive from a misunderstanding of [[w:Wu Zixu|Wu Zixu]]'s surname {{zh-l|伍|Wǔ}} as indicating a form of the number five {{zh-l|五}}.
